movies.title: (500) Days of Summer
movies.synopsis: This is not a love story. Tom, a greeting card writer and romantic idealist, reflects on his failed relationship with Summer, a woman who doesn't believe in true love. As he navigates through the 500 days of memories, Tom uncovers the harsh truths of expectations vs. reality in modern relationships.

movies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies.synopsis: Peter Parker seeks the help of Doctor Strange to make the world forget his revealed identity as Spider-Man. But when the spell goes wrong, villains from across the multiverse begin to arrive, forcing Peter to question the true cost of being a hero.

movies.title: One Day
movies.synopsis: After one day spent together at university graduation, Emma and Dexter begin a lifelong friendship. Over 20 years, they reconnect every July 15, sharing moments of joy, heartbreak, and self-discovery, ultimately revealing how one day can change everything.

movies.title: Interception
movies.synopsis: A skilled thief, Dom Cobb, has the rare ability to enter peopleâ€™s dreams and steal secrets from their subconscious. When offered a chance to have his criminal past erased, he must pull off the impossible: inceptionâ€”planting an idea rather than stealing one.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.synopsis: Batman raises the stakes in his war on crime. With the help of allies, he sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations in Gotham. But they soon find themselves prey to a reign of chaos unleashed by a criminal mastermind known as the Joker.

movies.title: La La Land
movies.synopsis: In the city of dreams, aspiring actress Mia and jazz pianist Sebastian pursue fame and passion. As success draws them apart, they face difficult choices about love, careers, and the sacrifices made in pursuit of their dreams.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.synopsis: As Earth faces ecological collapse, a group of explorers embarks on a mission through a wormhole in space, searching for a new planet for humanity. Love, time, and survival intersect in this emotional and visually stunning journey across galaxies.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.synopsis: When Thomas Anderson, a computer hacker, uncovers the truth about his reality being a simulated program created by machines, he joins a rebel group to fight for the freedom of humanity and discover the power within himself.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.synopsis: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the Avengers assemble one final time to undo Thanosâ€™s destruction and restore balance to the universe. In a story of sacrifice, teamwork, and legacy, heroes rise for one last epic battle.

movies.title: Frozen II
movies.synopsis: Elsa hears a mysterious voice calling her beyond Arendelle, prompting her, Anna, Kristoff, and Olaf to journey into an enchanted forest. There, they uncover ancient secrets and the origins of Elsaâ€™s powers, testing their bonds and courage.

movies.title: The Batman
movies.synopsis: Batman uncovers deep-rooted corruption in Gotham City while hunting the Riddler, a sadistic killer targeting the city's elite. As clues and cryptic messages pile up, Bruce Wayne must confront his family's legacy and define what kind of hero he wants to be.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.synopsis: The struggling Kim family infiltrates the wealthy Park household under false pretenses, leading to an escalating series of deceptions. As their lives intertwine, tensions rise, exposing the stark divide between rich and poor in a darkly satirical thriller.

movies.title: Coco
movies.synopsis: A young boy enters the Land of the Dead to unlock his family's history and love for music.

movies.title: Dune
movies.synopsis: A young man must protect his people and a powerful resource on a desert planet.

movies.title: Encanto
movies.synopsis: A Colombian girl struggles to find her worth in a magical family where everyone has powersâ€”except her.

movies.title: Loki
movies.synopsis: After stealing the Tesseract during the events of Avengers: Endgame, Loki finds himself recruited by the Time Variance Authority, a bureaucratic agency tasked with preserving the timeline. As he navigates this strange new world, he confronts alternate versions of himself and the consequences of his choices.

movies.title: Friends
movies.synopsis: Follow the hilarious and heartfelt lives of six close-knit friends' Rachel, Ross, Monica, Chandler, Joey, and Phoebeâ€”as they navigate relationships, careers, and quirky adventures in New York City. A sitcom classic that defines friendship and laughter.

movies.title: How I Met Your Mother
movies.synopsis: Ted Mosby recounts to his children the winding, comical, and often emotional journey that led him to meeting their mother. Along the way, Ted and his friends experience the ups and downs of love, work, and friendship in Manhattan.

movies.title: Beloved Summer
movies.synopsis: Years after their breakup, former high school sweethearts Choi Ung and Kook Yeon-su are forced to reunite when a documentary they filmed goes viral. As cameras roll again, past wounds, love, and regrets resurface in this touching coming-of-age romance.

movies.title: Reply 1988
movies.synopsis: Set in a close-knit neighborhood in 1980s Seoul, this nostalgic drama explores the lives of five childhood friends and their families. Filled with warmth, humor, and tears, the series highlights family values, youth dreams, and enduring friendships.

movies.title: Squid Game
movies.synopsis: Hundreds of financially desperate contestants accept an invitation to compete in deadly childrenâ€™s games for a tempting prize. As alliances form and betrayals emerge, the true cost of survival is revealed in this intense Korean thriller.

movies.title: The Crown
movies.synopsis: The Crown chronicles the reign of Queen Elizabeth II, portraying her political and personal challenges from youth to modern times. With stunning performances and period detail, it offers a behind-the-scenes look at the British royal family.

movies.title: Breaking Bad
movies.synopsis: Walter White, a high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with cancer, turns to cooking meth to secure his familyâ€™s future. As he descends into the criminal underworld with former student Jesse Pinkman, morality, loyalty, and power are tested.

movies.title: Game of Thrones
movies.synopsis: In the mythical land of Westeros, noble families battle for control of the Iron Throne. As political intrigue, betrayal, and war unfold, supernatural forces return, and the fate of the realm hangs in the balance.

movies.title: Stranger Things
movies.synopsis: When a young boy disappears, his friends uncover a secret government experiment and a mysterious girl with supernatural powers. Set in the 1980s, the series blends horror, sci-fi, and heartwarming friendship in a nostalgic adventure.

movies.title: The Mandalorian
movies.synopsis: A lone bounty hunter protects a mysterious child in the Star Wars universe.

movies.title: The Office
movies.synopsis: A mockumentary following the awkward, hilarious lives of office employees in Scranton.

movies.title: Sherlock
movies.synopsis: A modern-day Sherlock Holmes solves crimes in London with his friend Dr. Watson.

movies.title: The Queen's Gambit
movies.synopsis: An orphaned chess prodigy rises to fame while battling addiction and loneliness.

movies.title: Wednesday
movies.synopsis: Wednesday Addams attends Nevermore Academy and investigates dark mysteries tied to her family.
